body_html: I'm not sure whether to categorize this as a duplicate of #15880 or an independent feature request. My best understanding is that you simply want a lightweight solution to shrinking the GPU memory allocation without completely killing the TF process. Towards that end, I think @zheng-xq 's suggestion about extending Session.reset() sounds most promising. I don't understand how catboost provides a model solution. I'm not familiar with that program.

body: I'm not sure whether to categorize this as a duplicate of #15880 or an independent feature request.  My best understanding is that you simply want a lightweight solution to shrinking the GPU memory allocation without completely killing the TF process.  Towards that end, I think @zheng-xq 's suggestion about extending Session.reset() sounds most promising.    I don't understand how catboost provides a model solution.  I'm not familiar with that program.
